AcceptedFactionInvite.description: Triggered when a faction invite has been accepted.

parameters.description: The name of the faction the player accepted to join.
parameters.name: factionName

parameters.description: The name of the player who accepted the invitation.
parameters.name: playerName

parameters.description: The name of the safehouse the player accepted to join.
parameters.name: safehouseName

parameters.description: The name of the player who accepted the invitation.
parameters.name: playerName

AcceptedTrade.description: Triggered when a trade request has been accepted.

parameters.description: Whether the trade was accepted or not.
parameters.name: accepted

AddXP.description: Triggered when a player gains XP.

parameters.description: The character who's gaining XP.
parameters.name: character

parameters.description: The perk that is being leveled up.
parameters.name: perk

parameters.description: The perk level gained.
parameters.name: level

Attack.description: Triggered when a character is performing an attack.

parameters.description: The character who's performing the attack.
The charge time of the weapon used to perform the attack.
parameters.name: chargeTime

parameters.description: The hand weapon used to perform the attack.

AutoDrink.description: Triggered when a character is drinking automatically.

parameters.description: The character who needs to drink.

CalculateStats.description: Triggered when a character stats are being calculated.

parameters.description: The character whose stats are being calculated.

DoSpecialTooltip.description: Triggered when a special tooltip is being rendered, after a user right-clicked an object.

parameters.description: The tooltip object to be filled.
The grid square on which the tooltip has been triggered.

LevelPerk.description: Triggered when a perk is being leveled up.

parameters.description: The character whose perk is being leveled up or down.
The perk being leveled up or down.
parameters.name: perk

parameters.description: Perk level.
parameters.name: level

parameters.description: Whether the perk is being leveled up.
parameters.name: levelUp

LoadGridsquare.description: Triggered when a square is being loaded.

parameters.description: The grid square that is being loaded.

MngInvReceiveItems.description: Triggered when the game client is receiving inventory items from the server.

parameters.description: The items that are being received.
parameters.name: items

OnAIStateChange.description: Triggered before an AI state is being changed.

parameters.description: The character whose AI state is being changed.

parameters.description: The character whose AI state is being executed.

OnAIStateExit.description: Triggered when an AI state is being exited.

parameters.description: The character whose AI state is being exited.

OnAcceptInvite.description: Triggered when a Steam invite has been accepted.

The identifier of the tab in which the message is being added.

parameters.description: A string representing the weather. Can be either: "normal", "cloud", "rain", or "sunny"

parameters.description: The character who's colliding with another character.

parameters.description: The character who's being collided with.

OnCharacterCreateStats.description: Triggered when the stats of a character are being created.

parameters.description: The survivor whose description is being created.
The character who's about to die.

parameters.description: The survivor who's meeting another character.

The number of times the two characters already met. If zero, then this is their first encounter.

OnChatWindowInit.description: Triggered when the chat window is being initialized.

parameters.description: The player who initiated the client command.

OnConnectFailed.description: Triggered when the connection to the server has failed.

OnConnected.description: Triggered when the player successfully connects to the server.

parameters.name: state

parameters.description: The container which is being updated.

OnCoopJoinFailed.description: Triggered when a player fails to join a cooperative game.

OnSeeNewRoom.description: Triggered when a room is being seen by a character for the first time.

OnServerCommand.description: Triggered when a command from the server is being received.

parameters.description: The name of the module for this server command.
parameters.name: module

parameters.description: The text of the actual server command.
parameters.name: command

parameters.description: The list of arguments of the server command.
parameters.name: arguments

OnServerFinishSaving.description: Triggered when the server is done saving.

OnServerStartSaving.description: Triggered when the server starts saving.

OnServerStarted.description: Triggered when the game server has started.

OnServerStatisticReceived.description: Triggered when the game client receives statistics from the server.

OnSetDefaultTab.description: Triggered when the default chat tab has been set.

parameters.description: The chat tab that is being set as default.

OnSpawnRegionsLoaded.description: Triggered after spawn regions are loaded.

parameters.description: A table of spawn regions that have been loaded.
parameters.name: spawnRegions

OnSteamFriendStatusChanged.description: Triggered when the status of a friend changed on Steam.

parameters.description: Steam identifier of the user who's friend status has changed.
parameters.name: steamId

OnSteamGameJoin.description: Triggered when joining a game through Steam.

OnSteamWorkshopItemCreated.description: Triggered after a new Steam workshop item was successfully created.

parameters.description: The Steam identifier of the user who created the workshop item.
parameters.name: steamId

parameters.description: Whether the user has to accept the workshop legal agreement.
parameters.name: userNeedsToAcceptWorkshopLegalAgreement

OnSteamWorkshopItemNotCreated.description: Triggered when a Steam workshop item couldn't be created.

parameters.description: The result code indicating why the workshop item was not created.
parameters.name: result

OnSteamWorkshopItemNotUpdated.description: Triggered when a Steam workshop item couldn't be updated.

parameters.description: The result code indicating why the workshop item was not updated.
parameters.name: result

OnSteamWorkshopItemUpdated.description: Triggered after a Steam workship item was successfully updated.

parameters.description: Whether the user has to accept the workshop legal agreement.
parameters.name: userNeedsToAcceptWorkshopLegalAgreement

OnSwitchVehicleSeat.description: Triggered when a character is switching seat in a vehicle.

parameters.description: The player who's switching seat in the vehicle.

OnTabAdded.description: Triggered when a chat tab is added.

parameters.description: The name of the chat tab which was added.
parameters.name: tabTitle

parameters.description: The identifier of the chat tab which was added.
parameters.name: tabId

OnTabRemoved.description: Triggered when a chat tab is closed.

parameters.description: The name of the chat tab which was added.
parameters.name: tabTitle

parameters.description: The identifier of the chat tab which was added.
parameters.name: tabId

OnThunderEvent.description: Triggered when a thunderstorm is about to start.

parameters.description: The x coordinate where the thunder event is going to take place.
parameters.name: x

parameters.description: The y coordinate where the thunder event is going to take place.
parameters.name: y

parameters.description: Whether the thunder event will strike.
parameters.name: strike

parameters.description: Whether the thunder event will emit light.
parameters.name: light

parameters.description: Whether the thunder event will rumble.
parameters.name: rumble

OnTick.description: Triggered every tick, try to not use this one, use EveryTenMinutes instead because it can create a lot of frame loss/garbage collection.

parameters.description: The number of ticks.
parameters.name: numberTicks

OnTickEvenPaused.description: Same as OnTick, but triggered when the game is paused as well.

parameters.description: The number of ticks.
parameters.name: numberTicks

OnTileRemoved.description: Triggered when a tile object has been removed.

parameters.description: The object to be removed.
parameters.name: object

OnTriggerNPCEvent.description: Called when a player enters the trigger area of a NPC event.

parameters.description: The type of trigger of this NPC event.
parameters.name: triggerType

parameters.description: The ModData of this trigger.
parameters.name: modData

parameters.description: The building definition of this trigger.

OnUpdateModdedWeatherStage.description: Triggered when the modded weather sage is being updated.

parameters.description: The current weather period.
The current stage of the weather.
parameters.name: weatherStage

parameters.description: The strength of the air front.
parameters.name: strength

OnUseVehicle.description: Triggered when a character is using a vehicle.

parameters.description: The player who's driving the vehicle.
The vehicle which the player is driving.
Whether the player had been keeping the accelerator pressed or if it was just a tap.
parameters.name: pressedNotTapped

OnVehicleDamageTexture.description: Triggered when the texture of a vehicle part is changed after being damaged.

parameters.description: The player who's driving the vehicle.

OnVehicleHorn.description: Triggered when a character is using a vehicle horn.

parameters.description: The player who's driving the vehicle.
The vehicle that the player is driving.
Whether the vehicle horn is being pressed.
parameters.name: pressed

OnWaterAmountChange.description: Triggered when the amount of water in an object has changed.

parameters.description: The object in which the water amount is changing.
The amount of water that is being added or removed from the water container.
parameters.name: waterAmount

OnWeaponHitCharacter.description: Triggered when a character has been hit by a weapon.

parameters.description: The character whose weapon hit another character.
The character who's been hit by another character.
The hand weapon used to hit the character.
The damage inflicted to the character who's been hit.
parameters.name: damage

OnWeaponHitTree.description: Triggered when a character hits a tree with a hand weapon.

parameters.description: The character whose weapon hit a tree.
The hand weapon used to hit the tree.

OnWeaponHitXp.description: Triggered when a player is gaining XP for a successful hit.

parameters.description: The player who's wielding the weapon.
The hand weapon used to perform the attack.
The character who's being hit.
The damage split of the hit.
parameters.name: damageSplit

OnWeaponSwing.description: Triggered when a player swings a hand weapon.

parameters.description: The character who's wielding the weapon.
The hand weapon that is being wielded.

OnWeaponSwingHitPoint.description: Triggered when a hand weapon has reached the apex of its swing.

parameters.description: The character who's wielding the weapon.
The hand weapon that is being wielded.

OnWorldMessage.description: Triggered when a world message is being received.

parameters.description: The user sending the message.
parameters.name: user

parameters.description: The message that is being sent.
parameters.name: message

parameters.description: Whether the message should be displayed as local.
parameters.name: addLocal

parameters.description: Whether the message should be prefixed with the timestamp.
parameters.name: addTimestamp

parameters.description: The zombie who's about to get killed.
parameters.name: zombie

OnZombieUpdate.description: Triggered when a zombie is being updated.

parameters.description: The zombie who's being updated.

ReceiveFactionInvite.description: Triggered when a player is invited to join a faction.

parameters.description: The name of the faction for which the player received an invitation.
parameters.name: factionName

parameters.description: The name of the player who's been invited to join the faction.
parameters.name: playerName

ReceiveSafehouseInvite.description: Triggered when a player is invited to a safehouse.

parameters.description: The safehouse for which the player received an invitation.
The name of the player who's been invited to join the safehouse.
parameters.name: playerName

RequestTrade.description: Triggered when a character is requesting a trade with another character.

parameters.description: The player who's requesting the trade.

ReuseGridsquare.description: Triggered when a grid square is being reused.

parameters.description: The grid square that is going to be reused.

SendCustomModData.description: Triggered when the game server is sending custom ModData to the client.

ServerPinged.description: Triggered when the game client receives the response after intiating a ping to a server.

parameters.description: The IP address of the user who pinged the server.
parameters.name: ipAddress

parameters.description: The name of the user who pinged the server.
parameters.name: user

SwitchChatStream.description: Triggered when a user presses TAB on his keyboard to switch chat stream.

SyncFaction.description: Triggered when a faction is being synced by the server on client side.

parameters.description: The name of the faction which is going to get synchronized.
parameters.name: factionName

TradingUIAddItem.description: Triggered when a player adds an item to a trade.

parameters.description: The player who's adding an item to the trade.
The item which the player is adding to the trade.

TradingUIRemoveItem.description: Triggered when a player removes an item from a trade.

parameters.description: The player who's removing an item from the trade.
The index of the item that the player is removing from the trade.
parameters.name: itemIndex

TradingUIUpdateState.description: Triggered when a player updates the item state of a trade.

parameters.description: The player who's updating an item.
The index of the item that the player is updating.
parameters.name: itemIndex

UseItem.description: Triggered when a player is using an item.

parameters.description: The player who's using the item.
The item which the player is using.

ViewTickets.description: Triggered when the game client is receiving tickets from the server.

parameters.description: The buffer where to write the tickets.
parameters.name: tickets

WeaponHitCharacter.description: Triggered when a character is being hit with a hand weapon.

parameters.description: The character whose weapon hit another character.
The character who's been hit by another character.
The hand weapon used to hit the character.
The damage inflicted to the character who's been hit.
parameters.name: damage

WeaponSwing.description: Triggered when a character enters the swipe state.

parameters.description: The character who's wielding the weapon.
The hand weapon that is being wielded.

WeaponSwingHitPoint.description: Triggered when a character gains XP from a successful hit with a hand weapon.

parameters.description: The character who's swinging the weapon.
The hand weapon which the user is swinging.

onLoadModDataFromServer.description: Triggered after ModData has been received from the server.

parameters.description: The grid square whose ModData is getting loaded from the server.
